1523050.name: RPG Maker MZ - Steampunk Tiles
1523050.description:
The sound of grinding gears, scent of machine oil in the air and the sight of impossible machinery - all signs point to a Steampunk invasion!

Steampunk Tiles is a pint-sized entry into the mesmerizing world of Steampunk. Created by Sherman 3D, this pack includes the essentials you'll need to create a proper Steampunk bedroom. From gadgets strewn on the working table to gears and machinery, Steampunk Tiles MV is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources.

Features:
  • Basics needed to create a Steampunk bedroom.
  • Gears, pipes, lit windows and more!
  • Sample game with a map and tile set-up.
  • Tiles tested in and formatted for use in RPG Maker MV / MZ.
  • BONUS: Character set with walking sprite, animated battler, faceset and portrait.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1523050.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
